pages.text: The $(mob)Skeleton$() is a common monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(), including the surface at night. It attacks players on sight by keeping its distances and firing with a $(item)Bow$(). It burns when exposed to sunlight.$(p)A $(mob)Skeleton$() may spawn wearing armor, making it tougher and protecting it from sunlight if it wears a helmet.
$(mob)Skeletons$() drop $(item)Bones$() on death. They can be used to tame $(l:minecraft_wolf)$(mob)Wolves$() or to make $(item)Bone Meal$() to fertilize plants.
